p: Hydrodistillation of the leaves of E. sonchifolia yielded a pale-yellow essential oil (0.46%). A total of 62 constituents, 97.60% of E. sonchifolia volatile oil, were identified by GC-MS. The volatile oil composition is displayed in Table 3 and visualized in Figure 2. The leaf oil was dominated by sesquiterpenoids: γ-himachalene (25.16%), ( E)-caryophyllene (15.72%), γ-gurjunene (8.58%), ( E)-β-farnesene (3.96%), germacrene D (3.53%), and caryophyllene oxide (3.05%), in addition to the fatty acid palmitic acid (5.24%), and the monoterpene β-pinene (4.87%).
